title: Login Issue

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hi there,

Me and my duo partner were in champion select and he got disconnected. He had already locked in his champion and we got put into game. Due to the login issues he was unable to login and reconnect. Because of this we had to remake the game. However not only did he lose LP and receive leave-buster, but I also lost 17LP. It was because of the bug that this happened and I would appreciate it if my LP was restored and his too. My account name is "Knøppy." His account is "Bantz Wendy."
